page.title: 09LEISURE
page.content:
Even though Melton Mowbray is only a small town, there is much to do in one's spare time.
Melton Mowbray has many clubs & societies which one can join. Besides these Melton Mowbray has many attractive parks & sports grounds owned by the Town Estate. Melton Mowbray is also fortunate in having a theatre & sports complex completed in 1976 as part of the College of Further Education extensions. The College of Further Education also provides many classes which take place either during the day or in the evening.
Also in Melton Mowbray is the Working Men's Club,the British Legion Club,the Conservative Club, the Regal Cinema and the Waterfield Swimming Baths.
